Please examine the build results:

hyphenation-present:
     [echo] Hyphenation Support NOT Present - Layout tests which require hyphenation are NOT being run!

You need to install an English Hyphenation library (jar) if you want to run all the junit tests. You can build the nightly-build target to run fewer tests or just the 'jar-main' target to do a build of the fop.jar file.
